titleStmt.title: Document concerning the Sale of a Cow
titleStmt.author: @r, son of P3-ti-@r-sm3-t3.wy

msContents.summary: The text describes the sale of a cow named %t3-irt-bn to tow individuals, P3-ti-Itm, cultivator of Horus of Edfu, and a woman (name lost). He acknowledges that he will pay a penalty in case of breach the contract.

msItemStruct.note: the letter "t" that has a circumflex underneath is not supported in the font and wrote only "t" instead.
Pub. status: Recto, There are some writings on Verso

condition.ab: The papyrus is vertically broken into many pieces, especially at the left hand side as a result of fourteen folds, as well as one horizontal fold along the papyrus. The broken pieces have been attached to each other with Scotch-tape. Some restoration needs to be done in this papyrus.
